傻逼暴雪你亲妈与国服同在：）
国服账号说没就没，到现在也没个音讯。守望二改的也是一坨，PvE更是拉跨的炸裂，这就是你们宣称的主打PvE的OW2？非得绑定战令买，暴雪你吃相真难看，把你那阉割过的PvE单卖不好吗。做了那么多年质量就这，剧情推进的比大白都慢，搞职场xsr和zzzq倒是有一套。
一切平衡围绕OWL，现在OWL办不下去了又转移到平衡策划自己了。76这一点伤害来来回回改了几年了，改5v5后那么多上不了场的英雄倒是管都不管。实验模式也不开了，改动前瞻也没有了，新英雄出前的最后一天还没有技能演示，隔壁GTAOL都没这么挤牙膏的吧。
平衡瞎几把做，英雄瞎几把改，内购定价瞎几把定（在游戏里买杠铃片的钱已经够在现实买了）。雾子原地TP这种影响体验的BUG一直不修，新英雄上线即解锁这类影响赚钱的BUG修的倒是挺快。开服辣眼的UI第六赛季了才有所改善。让我们恭喜OW2，六个赛季了还没有达到它开服时应有的质量。希望OW2再接再厉，早日关服。
开个怀旧服把OW1还给我们吧，至少OW1是个好游戏，真正的第九艺术，我的青春。

👉🤡👈给暴雪亲妈上坟
2016年七月份到2023年1月24号期间，我有7个ow的号，都是回忆和心血啊！byd暴雪还我数据！

我是一位00后。12岁跟朋友一起解除了魔兽世界和暴雪游戏，一直玩到关服。个人记忆比较深刻的是刷了很多天的万圣节匕首，是圣诞树样子的我觉得还挺好看的，还有暗夜马戏团的飞火圈，那叫一个恶心啊。朋友都不玩了以后加入了一个互相素不相识的公会打团本，我是团队里的副t，当时玩儿的防骑，因为当时年龄还挺小的，加了yy语音频道里也不怎么敢吱声，得亏应该是没犯什么大错，也没被t也没人搭理我。
       星际争霸和特别厉害的朋友一起打pvp，我什么都看不懂就看他俩嘎嘎乱杀，和另外几个朋友打内战，哥们儿喝高了在嘴里念着星际的轴（几分几秒该干嘛）我也听不懂，就在那儿跟着傻乐。暗黑三朋友带我在折磨十几的难度练级，叫我不要乱动站着看就好，他漏了一只小小蜘蛛我就寻思，这小蜘蛛我也能打，然后就被摸死了，没记错的话伤害好像有好几亿。炉石传说，从开服玩到诺森德，玩得不多但好歹也上过一个赛季的传说，拼拼凑凑能组出来一套全金的星界德。
       风暴英雄，这位更是重量级，刚玩儿的时候新英雄是萨尔，玩儿了这么多年都没等到一个好看的皮肤，好怀念贴盾的塔萨达尔啊，从萨尔到2.0到机甲风暴2再到宣布停更，风暴就永远在要火的路上，小时候问别的同学，你玩儿风暴英雄吗？他回答，风暴英雄什么垃圾游戏会有人玩儿？不如英雄联盟。我问他你玩过么你就骂，他说玩过。我说，行，你随便叫出来一个英雄的名字或者技能，他支支吾吾说不出来，最后就是一句垃圾游戏谁会记得，于是我直接揍了他一顿，往往拳头还是管用的。
       最后是我们的主角，守望先锋。就在刚刚，回欧服打了一把，上来就奖励了我快速了一把残局捏。ow刚出的时候我在国外留学，我寻思啊，暴雪出品必属精品，花了60欧买了典藏版的光盘。那会儿玩儿得那叫一个昏天黑地啊，5dva1dj照着花村就是一顿乱冲，半藏e散往脚下瞄准谁来谁死，源氏有大的时候偷摸儿找个小缝儿，等对面儿来了就是一个超级跳拔刀一通乱砍，对面掉没掉人不重要，重要的是帅就完了。英雄平衡差？我不在意，我不爱打竞技模式，反正是快速游戏我想玩什么玩什么。英雄更新慢？我也不是很在意，有的玩儿就行。半藏的散被删了，我忍了，虽然是我很喜欢的技能，我觉得它设计得很新颖很有趣，我依稀记得删了的原因好像是暴雪觉得这个技能太强了，随机性太高，被打的玩家经常不知道自己怎么就死了。我想了想，确实。好吧，忍了。后来出了个新英雄叫莫伊拉我一看那个黑球，您倒好，追着人吸吸吸吸，跟他妈个痴汉似的，走到哪儿吸到哪儿。我寻思这他妈不比你那半藏的散更恶心么，这是我第一次这么义愤填膺得骂暴雪。再往后，让娜娜玩家们闻风丧胆的黑叔叔，末日铁拳上线了。我日你妈的铁拳，小技能伤害嘎嘎高就算了，随随便便打断别人的大招就你妈离谱。什么狗逼英雄？？？后来出来个更imba的小锤，追着铁拳揍，舒服了。到了ow2，更新了啥？6v6没了，变成和其他游戏一样的5v5，特色没了。变免费了，所以我欧服和国服两个全款买的典藏版我他妈是双倍的小丑是吧。再然后，号儿都他妈没了，好一个全心全意为玩家啊。
      暴雪的这些游戏我可能算不上那群核心玩家，我就一纯纯的休闲党，哪怕10年的时间也肯定比不上很多人，但是最后的结果依然是“众生平等”，大家的号都没啦，哈哈。什么凤凰、群星之怒、蛋刀、成就、骷髅284、粉红天使全没啦！一点都不剩啦！
      暴毙烤迪克你干得好啊，先是搞没了虐杀原形3又来搞暴雪了是吧,你妈什么时候死啊？你妈什么时候死啊？你妈什么时候死啊？暴毙烤迪克你妈什么时候死啊？鲍比·考迪克你妈什么时候死啊？鲍比考迪克你什么时候死啊？Bobby Kotick when will your mother die?Bobby Kotick when will you die？
       能看到这里的朋友们，走过路过不要错过，都给ow打上一个宝贵的差评吧，你们要是再不打差评，我可要去给三国杀刷好评了啊！

词穷了
什么狗几把玩意

Background:
Been playing for 5+ years, been within T500/GM for the past 2 or so years. Reached T20+ on Tank/Sup. I have played in, coached in all ranks, played in tournaments, and scrimmed at high levels.

For the casual player:
Overwatch has the potential to be a good game someone looking just to play this game casually. It can be so much fun to play arcade, quick play and custom games with friends or by yourself. The thrill of trying new gamemodes, mastering new heroes can't be matched by many games. However it is not beginner friendly at all. Overwatch is one of the hardest FPS to master by far. It's unlike Valorant where static aim is rewarded heavily. In Overwatch, everything is moving all the time, or flying through the air. You will likely need to develop a completely new mindset and gamesense for this game if you are coming from a game like CSGO or Valorant. COD/Apex players will likely have an easier time getting to grips with the aim mechanics.

Monetization:
While this game is "free to play", it markets HEAVILY to its casual players trying to get them to purchase overpriced skins at every turn. While the skins are admittedly amazing to look at and have amazing effects, they come at steep prices. As well as the fact you can only see your gun 99% of the time so the entire skin won't even be for you. The battle pass, the other way to earn skins, is also monetised for the good skins. However, it is often lacking in reward value the majority of the seasons we've seen so far.

The descent into competitive:
It's still important to note that while you can intend to remain casual in this game, the sheer effort required to learn and master heroes will inevitably suck you into a competitive mindset. You might find yourself inadvertently creating a competitive mindset for yourself, which can lead to frustration in casual game modes, especially when you realise you will rarely synergise with other players in these game modes.

Competitive Play:
The big problems start here. Part of Overwatch's allure to existing players in the FPS community, is the promise of skill based balanced competitive play. However, Overwatch's competitive scene could not be further from this promise.
The competitive scene, once a beacon for professional eSports is crumbling before us.

While there is a wide variety of heroes, it can be exciting to try new styles of play each and every game. Unfortunately the Dev team are quite frankly, incapable of balancing their game and heroes. You will, unfortunately be forced to play certain heroes in order to find value. Even if you find one hero a lot of fun, it is likely you will  be forced off by the enemy team absolutely ruining your fun by playing hard-counter picks.

Certain hero combos have been dominating the game for years, but remain untouched. (literally any mercy pocketed dps). This can end up leading to one sided dominance, QUITE FREQUENTLY, unless the other team swaps to mirror or counterplay in boring ways. 

Tank heroes, for example, boast high HP pools as well as incredible survivability. However they find themselves extremely vulnerable and immobilised to any one of a handful of heroes that the enemy team is more than likely to pick in comp. Making for an extremely unfun, rock/paper/scissors type gameplay in which you're constantly switching heroes just at a chance to stay alive.

Playerbase/Matchmaking:
Over the past half decade+ the Overwatch community have constantly raised concerns about matchmaking. Disparities in skill levels, slow matchmaking, particularly at higher ranks, completely ruin what little competitive integrity Overwatch barely has.

It seems that Blizzard has neglected the competitive scene entirely even coming into Overwatch 2. While, as a community, we provide feedback we often feel ignored. Since the company seems to prioritise short term profits in skins and battlepass content, over long-term substantial competitive/core gameplay improvements.

If you play competitive long enough, you WILL either feel angry, upset, discontent and completely neglected by Blizzard, or all of the above at once.

Matchmaking is, put simply, AWFUL. Many players will find their ranks inflated for no reason by Blizzard with no reason given. They hide the MMR the "rankup system of 5 wins" never truly reflects your ACTUAL MMR and SR and is purely for show. I have placed many fresh accounts over the years. Even recently I've had accounts that place in GM3 and some that place P5, even though I will have a better win record on the account that places Plat.

This rank inflation causes lobbies to be have massive skill gaps that are made apparent immediately. 1 weak link will cause an entire team to fall apart as solo carry potential in Overwatch 2 is borderline non-existent. 

You will also rarely find a non-toxic lobby in competitive overwatch. While you will now and then find some nice players this is normally in games you win. If you lose, and you have below-average stats. Best be prepared to be flamed to kingdom-come by the rest of your team. 

The best example of complete neglect by the dev team is the long-awaited (4 years) but eventually cancelled PVE modes.
These 4 years we were completely neglected with little to no content given to us. We still held onto hope that after many years we'd get our promised game mode that would revive the game. Unfortunately, the 4 years of suffering and neglect by Blizzard was rewarded by absolutely nothing. They ruined their own competitive and casual scene just to scrap the only reason they made this "2nd" game.

Blizzard is a company that prioritises short-term profits from casual players, rather than prioritising the long-term benefits of actually prioritising players who have been dedicated to this game for years.

TL;DR
Overwatch can be a fun game for casual players only, but this comes with a relatively steep learning curve.
However that's where the positives stop. Nothing about this game is enjoyable, from its matchmaking, to its core game mechanics to how the Dev team have neglected the player-base for years to never deliver on year long promises. 

Do not play this game if you want to have a good time. You should only play this game's competitive mode if you already have anger issues, and do not care about your own mental health, or the mental of the players you play with.

I went out of my way to download the game ONLY to leave this review.
I played Overwatch for hundreds of hours at release, before Blizzard started its downward spiral, and now I really want for this company to go bankrupt.

If you are playing this game today, after all that's been said and done, when there are so many other free/cheap games to play, you have really poor judgement.
If you SOMEHOW still are a Blizzard fan even after everything that happened, prepare to continue being surprised and disappointed, while everyone else on the internet laughs at you.

此次上steam除了可以在这里下载以外和此前没有任何变化，游戏依然是亚服，国内注册依旧繁琐麻烦。完全没有一点尊重国内玩家的改进。。

这个游戏我从一六年玩到关服，我见证了它的繁荣和衰败，我甚至还在里面认识了她，这款游戏基本就是我的整个青春，从上学玩到工作，虽然暴雪没有把我们国内玩家当人，但是我对守望先锋一直有着一股感情，无法抹去，即使已经被这个游戏疯狂喂shit，我还是期待着今天能再玩上一玩，但是事实是此次游戏只是单纯挂上steam，导致我今天意料之中得又被这游戏扇了一巴掌。。

以前总是觉得守望更新又慢，活动又少，但现在想想，当初的守望一，或许才是自己最想要的守望，转眼国服已经关闭大半年了，我和她也已经分开一年多了，直布罗陀，国王大道，努巴尼，爱心瓦尔德，，，，这些遍布记忆和脚印的地方，何时又能再去走一遭呢？

或许下一次，我还是会像今天这样，再一次被暴雪打上一巴掌，但是我还是会期待着，守望重返国服那天，我爱的是哪个永远是那个6v6的买断制游戏。。。至于暴雪，我真不熟。

아무리 좋은 게임이라도 운영이 병신이면 망한다는 것에 교과서적인 게임.

오버워치1 부터 한국에서는 pc방에서 롤을 제치고 1위를 할 정도로 엄청나게 인기많았던 게임이지만 뒤로가서 그냥 병신이됬음.

오버워치 1때 핵, 대리, 패작 못잡고 방치하는 수준으로 놔두다가 나중에 고치고 
사골 수준으로 이벤트 재탕하고 많은 사람들이 오버워치의 스토리를 풀어달라 했는데 
몇년 동안 솔져는 게이고 트레이서는 레즈비언이다 같은 pc질만 처하고 
몇개월 동안 고착되는 영웅 조합과 존나게 안하는 밸런스 패치, 존나 안나오는 신규 영웅 등 
정석적으로 망하는 길를 향해 풀스피드로 달려가다가 갑자기 PVE를 처만든다고 다 죽어가는 게임을 그냥 버림 그러고는 오버워치2를 만듬.

그리고 나온 오버워치2 그래픽 좀 좋아지고 전장에 밤낮 생기고 6대6에서 5대5되고 
영웅 밸런스 조금 바뀐것 말고는 오버워치1과 다른게 전혀 없는 게임으로 처나오는데 
심지어 게임을 지들 마음대로 무료로 바꿈 기존에 약 5만원 주고 구매한 사람들 병신으로 만듬.
무료로 바꿨다고 인게임에서 스킨을 파는데 가격은 개창렬임. 

2로 바뀌어도 여전히 답이없음 몇개월동안 PVE만든다고 업데이트 유기하고 지금도 업데이트와 밸런스 패치는 답이 없음. 게임이 뭐가 없어 이 게임을 하게 만드는 이유가 있어야 하는데 없음 재미도 없고 패치도 안해 밸런스 병신이야 할 것도 별로 없어 다 딴 겜으로 떠남.

그래도 사람들이 PVE만들고 있다고 하니까 참아줬음 공개한 PVE가 재미있어 보였고 
몇몇 사람들은 오버워치2 PVE나오면 날아오른다하고 기대하면서 다 존나 참아주고 기다렸는데 이미 오버워치2로 PVE 만든다 지랄하다가 21년 하반기에 PVE못만든다 확정해놓고 1년 6개월 동안 입꾹처닫고 있다가 23년 5월에 PVE 못 만든다고 지랄함 아니 씨발 그럼 그때까지 뭐했는데.

그래놓고는 기존에 만들던거는 아까웠는지 오버워치1 사골 이벤트 처럼 PVE를 낸다고 해서
그래 안 내는 것보다는 낫겠지 했는데 이번에 출시한 2시간 짜리 이벤트를 18600원이나 
처 받고 돈주고 팜 지들 마음대로 약 5만원 했던 게임을 PVE 만든다고 2로 만들어서 
무료로 풀어버리고서는 PVE는 또 돈주고 사라고 함 진짜 병신인가? 이정도면 책 나와도 됨
'세계적으로 유행한 게임을 병신으로 만드는 운영방법 100선' 하고. 

지금이 밑바닥인줄 알았는데 진짜 바닥에도 더 바닥이 있다 병신겜.
你都敢来了那也应该承受相应的谩骂了，一手好牌打得如此稀烂
